\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w devised|strong="H3289"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H6030"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Shittim|strong="H7851"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6666"\w* \w acts|strong="H6666"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w shown|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w require|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w act|strong="H6213"\w* \w justly|strong="H4941"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w humbly|strong="H6800"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w calls|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*— \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w* \w fears|strong="H3372"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*— “\w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w appointed|strong="H3259"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Are|strong="H7563"\w* there \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* treasures \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w short|strong="H7332"\w* ephah\f + \fr 6:10 \ft An ephah is a measure of volume (about 22 litres or about 2/3 of a bushel), and a short ephah is made smaller than a full ephah for the purpose of cheating customers.\f* \w that|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* accursed?

Shall \w I|strong="H2135"\w* tolerate \w dishonest|strong="H4820"\w* \w scales|strong="H3976"\w*, \w and|strong="H4820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bag|strong="H3599"\w* \w of|strong="H3599"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* weights?

\w Her|strong="H4390"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w men|strong="H6223"\w* \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, \w her|strong="H4390"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H8267"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w speech|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grievous|strong="H2470"\w* wound. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w made|strong="H8074"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* eat, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*. \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* hunger \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* store \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* save, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w which|strong="H2719"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* save \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* won’t \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w olives|strong="H2132"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* won’t \w anoint|strong="H5480"\w* yourself \w with|strong="H1869"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*; \w and|strong="H8081"\w* crush \w grapes|strong="H8492"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* won’t \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.
